thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Eric Funderburg
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Eric Funderburg

author: Eric Funderburg
title: Eric Funderburg
text: We've had our machine for over a year now, and could not be happier. The machine itself is great quality and easy to work with. The technical support received through BOSS has always been excellent as well. They stand behind their machines and provide a great warranty. We would happily buy from them again and recommend them.
